channel.title: Covid-19 on Curiosity432 Blog

item.title: Covid-19
item.description: I am going to write about this topic after almost two years since I started. To give a summary of how I thought before and how I think now, how things have evolved and put some perspective to the matter. Covid-19 started at the official level in December 2019 in Wuhan, China, in a market area and through the contagion of a batsman it reached humans. Once China started to spread globally, slowly through different countries, a monumental hype started to be created about the issue.
